description: Single storey front extension incorporating porch
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size: 14px;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no unobscurely glazed windows or doors shall be installed in the eastern side / flank elevation facing 84 Arundel Drive of the front extension hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</span></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p><span style="font-size: 14px;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">Site Location Plan; Sheet 1 â€“ Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plans; Sheet 2 - Existing and Proposed First Floor Plans; Sheet 3 - Existing and Proposed Roof Plan; Sheet 4 - Existing and Proposed Elevations 1; Sheet 5 - Existing and Proposed Elevations 2; Sheet 6 - Existing and Proposed Block Plans; Sheet 7 Fire Safety Plan; Reasonable Exception Statement;&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">All plans received valid 21.11.24&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
